name: ProcessInfo
desc: A collection of information about the current process.

items.name: class var processInfo: ProcessInfo
items.desc: Returns the process information agent for the process.

items.name: var arguments: [String]
items.desc: Array of strings with the command-line arguments for the process.

items.name: var environment: [String : String]
items.desc: The variable names (keys) and their values in the environment from which the process was launched.

items.name: var globallyUniqueString: String
items.desc: Global unique identifier for the process.

items.name: var isMacCatalystApp: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the process originated as an iOS app and runs on macOS.

items.name: var isiOSAppOnMac: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the process is an iPhone or iPad app running on a Mac.

items.name: var processIdentifier: Int32
items.desc: The identifier of the process (often called process ID).

items.name: var processName: String
items.desc: The name of the process.

items.name: var userName: String
items.desc: Returns the account name of the current user.

items.name: var fullUserName: String
items.desc: Returns the full name of the current user.

items.name: func disableSuddenTermination()
items.desc: Disables the application for quickly killing using sudden termination.

items.name: func enableSuddenTermination()
items.desc: Enables the application for quick killing using sudden termination.

items.name: func disableAutomaticTermination(String)
items.desc: Disables automatic termination for the application.

items.name: func enableAutomaticTermination(String)
items.desc: Enables automatic termination for the application.

items.name: var automaticTerminationSupportEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the app supports automatic termination.

items.name: var hostName: String
items.desc: The name of the host computer on which the process is executing.

items.name: var operatingSystemVersionString: String
items.desc: A string containing the version of the operating system on which the process is executing.

items.name: var operatingSystemVersion: OperatingSystemVersion
items.desc: The version of the operating system on which the process is executing.

items.name: func isOperatingSystemAtLeast(OperatingSystemVersion) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the version of the operating system on which the process is executing is the same or later than the given version.

items.name: var processorCount: Int
items.desc: The number of processing cores available on the computer.

items.name: var activeProcessorCount: Int
items.desc: The number of active processing cores available on the computer.

items.name: var physicalMemory: UInt64
items.desc: The amount of physical memory on the computer in bytes.

items.name: var systemUptime: TimeInterval
items.desc: The amount of time the system has been awake since the last time it was restarted.

items.name: func beginActivity(options: ProcessInfo.ActivityOptions, reason: String) -> NSObjectProtocol
items.desc: Begin an activity using the given options and reason.

items.name: func endActivity(NSObjectProtocol)
items.desc: Ends the given activity.

items.name: func performActivity(options: ProcessInfo.ActivityOptions, reason: String, using: () -> Void)
items.desc: Synchronously perform an activity defined by a given block using the given options.

items.name: func performExpiringActivity(withReason: String, using: (Bool) -> Void)
items.desc: Performs the specified block asynchronously and notifies you if the process is about to be suspended.

items.name: var thermalState: ProcessInfo.ThermalState
items.desc: The current thermal state of the system.

items.name: var isLowPowerModeEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates the current state of Low Power Mode.

items.name: struct OperatingSystemVersion
items.desc: A structure that contains version information about the currently executing operating system, including major, minor, and patch version numbers.

items.name: struct ProcessInfo.ActivityOptions
items.desc: Option flags used with beginActivity(options:reason:) and performActivity(options:reason:using:).

items.name: enum ProcessInfo.ThermalState
items.desc: Values used to indicate the systemâ€™s thermal state.

items.name: class let thermalStateDidChangeNotification: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: Posts when the thermal state of the system changes.

items.name: static let NSProcessInfoPowerStateDidChange: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: Posts when the power state of a device changes.
